Go4 community is designed for sharing and appreciating Go4 videos

- To create your own HD quality video blog. Go4 community offers you a great space to share and store your videos that is unparalleled.
- To create a platform that allows for inspiration from other awesome videos in the community. With merely one click, you can directly apply music, visual effects and editing skills that you like from others' videos into creating your own.
- To explore a lively world in the community. You can discover incredible videos from your friends and users all around the globe.

The latest Go4 just added a community, and we started to optimize:
- Optimized the post process and experience, adding tips on key steps.
- Fixed some nasty bugs.
- If you have not made your first Go4 video yet, click on the "+" button to get into the album and make a new one.
- Welcome to post your awesome videos and share them with your friends and users all around the globe!

- Optimized the post process and experience, adding tips on key steps.
- Fixed some nasty bugs.
- If you have not made your first Go4 video yet, click on the "+" button to get into the album and make a new one.

We have
- Re-designed “Selection” with brand new visual style, optimized audio autoplay and publish experience.
- Fixed the heat problem.
- Improved the video making speed by 30%.
- Fixed some minor bugs.
 
Thanks for your feedbacks! They are extremely valuable to us. We will keep optimizing Go4 to bring you better experience. 
 
Finally, we wish you a wonderful adventure with Go4.

Feedback email: support_go4@camera360.com

We have
- Re-designed “Selection” with brand new visual style, optimized audio autoplay and publish experience.
- Fixed the heat problem.
- Improved the video making speed by 30%.
- Fixed some minor bugs.
 
Thanks for your feedbacks! They are extremely valuable to us. We will keep optimizing Go4 to bring you better experience. 
 
Finally, we wish you a wonderful adventure with Go4.

Feedback email: support_go4@camera360.com

Updates:

We have redesigned the selected plaza and editing module with a new visual style, so that the whole process become more smoothly and concise. At the same time, Go4 will automatically select the appropriate number of clips based on the length of your video. The new volume balance will give you more creativity between background sound and music.

- Fixed the heat problem and improving the stability.
- Video creation speed increased by 30%.
- Video resolution improved by 40%.
- Fix bugs.

Updates:

We have redesigned the selected plaza and editing module with a new visual style, so that the whole process become more smoothly and concise. At the same time, Go4 will automatically select the appropriate number of clips based on the length of your video. The new volume balance will give you more creativity between background sound and music.

- Fixed the heat problem and improving the stability.
- Video creation speed increased by 30%.
- Video resolution improved by 40%.
- Fix bugs.

. This version of our app has greatly improve the stability and fluency, perfectly supporting the high-frame rate video captured by GoPro or DJI. All your videos sleeping in your device have chance to impress your friends.
. Fixed some bugs related to iOS11.
